scripts.build-and-serve: pnpm setup-and-install && pnpm --filter "./front-end" build && pnpm serve
scripts.clean: rm -rf back-end/node_modules && rm -rf front-end/node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.docker:all: docker compose down && docker compose up --build
scripts.docker:db: docker compose down && docker compose up mongodb -d
